solution_line_template: She spent {num_lollipops} x ${lollipop_cost_each} = $<<{num_lollipops}*{lollipop_cost_each}={lollipops_total_cost}>>{lollipops_total_cost} for the lollipops.
She also spent {num_gummies_packs} x ${gummies_cost_each_pack} = $<<{num_gummies_packs}*{gummies_cost_each_pack}={gummies_total_cost}>>{gummies_total_cost} for the gummies.
